title: Conservation of momentum - center of mass

content.question: Which of the following best represents the velocity vector of the center of mass of the two-block system following the collision?

choices.label: The figure shows a 4-by-4 square grid with a dot in the center and an arrow extending from the dot 2 units to the left horizontally
The figure shows a 4-by-4 square grid with a dot in the center and an arrow extending from the dot two-thirds units to the left horizontally
The figure shows a 4-by-4 square grid with a dot in the center and no arrow. It is indicated that v sub center-of-mass equals 0.
The figure shows a 4-by-4 square grid with a dot in the center and an arrow extending from the dot 1 unit to the right horizontally.

content.answer: The figure shows a 4-by-4 square grid with a dot in the center and an arrow extending from the dot two-thirds units to the left horizontally
